page.title: 14Playground games in Dalton
page.content: The most popular games in our play- ground are skipping and football.Some of the skipping games include "Sally in the Kitchen","Under Over","Cowboy Joe","Spanish Lady","High,Low","Double Dutch",and "All in together girls." The rules for "Sally in the Kitchen" are one person skips and another one runs in and chases them out.For "Under Over" first you go under the rope and then over the rope etc.For "Cowboy Joe"you do actions like sticking your guns up and running in and out.The rest are simliar to these.Some less popular games at playtime include hand stands against the wall,netball practise,races,and tig.Netball is just throwing the ball to one another and trying to get the ball from the other team.Only a few children do running races round the yard.Tig is well known where someone runs after other people.
